{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ALFA Network |model=Hornet |revision=-UB |upc= |ean=4718050301669 |asin=B00A8UKSE0;GB; |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/30/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Accton |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=wireless embedded board,wireless router |fcc_id=UQ2121 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9331 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6406EM2I-12G |fla1_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ProMOS |ram1_model=V58C2256164SHI5 |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9331 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''Atheros 802.11n Embedded Board with USB Port'''
[http://www.alfa.com.tw/products_show.php?pc=35&ps=121 Product page]
"P/N:14162022000"... and "REV:"?"01" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :Likely OEM Accton / AWB (NPL003792)
"PCBA-Hornet AP" is on the label on the device in the FCC photos.
*[https://openwrt.org/toh/alfa_network/hornet-ub On the '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
Same board may be used as.. *AP121 :AP121U :AP121U-64 (16MB Flash, 64MB RAM version) *AWAP02O-NSR :AWAP02O-NSRC *EAP1124XS *N2-SR :N2-SRC *Solo-NSR :Solo-NSRC *Tube2H :Tube2HSMA *WISP-NSR :WISP-NSRC *Hornet • ([http://www.alfa.com.tw/products_show.php?pc=99&ps=112 PPage]) :Hornet-SHB • ([http://www.alfa.com.tw/products_show.php?pc=99&ps=104 PPage]) :Hornet-UB • ([http://www.alfa.com.tw/products_show.php?pc=99&ps=50 PPage]) ([http://www.data-alliance.net/-strse-640/Alfa-Hornet-dsh-UB-Atheros-AR9331/Detail.bok On Data-Alliance]) :*8MB Flash, 32MB RAM :Hornet-UB-64 • ([http://www.alfa.com.tw/products_show.php?pc=99&ps=202 PPage]) ::Since 2015 a 16/64 MB version named "Hornet-UB-64" is sold. ::Its 16 MB Flash is a ''Macronix'' MX25L12835F and ::its 64 MB RAM is a ''Nanya'' NT5DS32M16DS.
